attributes.action: Resolve future conflicts by playing, "paper scissors and stone game".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The leaders of any country in dispute should have a game of this to resolve any disputes. (best of 5)

Nobody has ever been killed by this game yet, And we think it would be a better way to resolve conflict than war.
Koffi Anan can be the referee....

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
